title: Celluloid college: basic motion picture technique
creator_credit: Emil E. Brodbeck, Roy Creveling and Sterling Educational Films
brief_description: An instructional film for amateur movie makers; includes demonstrations and explanations of panning, using the tripod; shot break down; screen direction; matching; newsreel shooting; build-up; composition; indoor lighting. Concludes by presenting an amusing short play in which all the techniques emphasized in the film are incorporated.
